```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
#janitor::clean_names   this allow us to jsut load the package we need

avocado<-read_csv("avocado.csv")

avocado%>%head()

avocado<-avocado%>%
  janitor::clean_names()

```

# data wrangling

**WOW**
we did `filter`

`arrange` for sorting variables

```{r}
avocado%>%
  arrange(average_price)%>%
  head()
```

lets change the order

```{r}
avocado%>%
  arrange(desc(average_price))%>%
  head()
```

lets `select`

```{r}
dim(avocado)

avocado_short<-avocado%>%
  select(date, average_price,total_volume)
```
